section.title: Examples
section.para: The sample application provided for Diameter Sh (Client) supports two scenarios:

listitem.para: The application is requested for user data
The application receives a subscription to user data

formalpara.title: Application is requested for user data
formalpara.para: In this case, the example simply sends a request to the remote peer (HSS). It requests data for a certain user.

formalpara.title: Application receives subscription to user data
formalpara.para: In this case, the example service subscribes in HSS to changes to the user profile. Once the subscription is estabilished, the example service will receive .

section.title: Configuration
section.para: At this time, the example does not allow for direct configuration.
